page.title: 17Clubs
page.content: In the Village Hall an indoor bowling club meets on Tuesday and Thursday evenings during the winter months.This is the game with the diamond in the middle of the carpet green. The Women's Institute meets once a month , also in the hall.They usually have a visiting demonstrator or speaker , a competition, and supper as well as business. The Youth Club meets on Tuesday nights in the Expedition Centre.Most activities are for boys. There are no clubs in the Inn. Those interested in darts and pools leagues go to other public houses in the area. In the 60's and early 70's there was an annual show called the Netherton Frolic which consisted of sports and horse-riding activities. Last year there was a Scottish Country Dance group in the Hall.
